snippet: The Vatican confirmed that it had withdrawn 6,000 coins commemorating Pope Francis’ first year as pope when it was discovered that “Jesus” had been misspelled.
abstract: Vatican confirms that it has withdrawn 6,000 coins honoring Pope Francis after discovery that word 'Jesus' was misspelled.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican confirmed that it had withdrawn 6,000 coins commemorating Pope Francis’ first year as pope when it was discovered that “Jesus” had been misspelled.

headline.main: Coins Celebrating Pope Misspell Name Above All Names

keywords.value: Italian State Mint and Polygraphic Institute
